page.title: 14ATTITUDES
page.content: We asked people if they liked living in the country.All except four people said yes,they did. We asked why and the main reasons were (a)it is quiet (b)people are friendly (c)a good social life (d)beautiful countryside in easy reach of big towns. 2 people said they did not like living in the country becauseit was too quiet. 2 people said they did not know whether they liked it or not. We asked people if they went to church or chapel and more than 70% said yes,but we do not think they all go regularly because the congregation is not very big except at Christmas.
